news.sectionSubtitle: Insights, partnerships, and breakthroughs from the MIRACL.ai community.

card1.title: AI-assisted quantification of cardiac fibrosis
card1.excerpt: Our imaging scientists unveil an automated pipeline that accelerates fibrosis quantification across multi-center clinical trials.

card2.title: New collaboration with AP-HP data hub
card2.excerpt: We join forces with AP-HP's data hub to co-design interoperable imaging datasets ready for large-scale AI validation.

card3.title: First patients enrolled in MIRACL-Flow study
card3.excerpt: The prospective MIRACL-Flow study officially kicked off with its first cohort, focusing on longitudinal cardiovascular imaging markers.

card4.title: Launching the MIRACL developer sandbox
card4.excerpt: A secure cloud sandbox now lets partners prototype cardiovascular AI algorithms with curated datasets and governance built in.
card4.imageAlt: Abstract illustration of connected heart data

research.strapline: The infrastructure behind collaborative cardiovascular imaging research.
research.description: MIRACL.ai connects cardiologists, radiologists, engineers, and data scientists to advance cardiovascular research. We provide centralized imaging services, tailored AI solutions, and scientific support to accelerate impactful studies.

card1.title: Centralized multimodal analysis
card1.description: Expert review across every cardiovascular imaging modality (MRI, CT, ultrasound, ECG, angiography). Achieve the robustness and reliability your clinical trials and publications require.

card2.title: End-to-end project support
card2.description: From study design to secure data collection, we guide every stage of your projects. Our specialists ensure methodology, quality control, and regulatory compliance.

card3.title: Data for AI innovation
card3.description: Access expertly annotated multimodal registries. Validate algorithms and create new biomarkers with unique multi-center, multi-pathology cohorts.

auth.name: Name
auth.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

about.title: About Lariboisière Hospital
about.description:
Lariboisière Hospital, a flagship institution of AP-HP, combines academic expertise and medical innovation to serve northern Paris. Since its creation it has become a reference center for cardiology and advanced imaging.

Its multidisciplinary teams care for more than 100,000 patients every year and deliver complete care pathways, from prevention to the most complex interventions. Cutting-edge facilities and research partnerships provide fast and accurate diagnostics.

In partnership with MIRACL.ai, the hospital accelerates the development of digital solutions that improve care quality and coordination between medical and research teams.
